description.value:
Once per game session, a user may re-roll a failed Medicae Test involving Surgery (Blood loss, saving/amputating limbs, attaching bionics, etc), or an Interrogation Test (Torture attempts).

Requirements

A set of medical tools, useful for keeping people alive or making them wish they were dead.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
description.summary: Once per game session, a user may re-roll a failed Medicae Test involving Surgery (Blood loss, saving/amputating limbs, attaching bionics, etc), or an Interrogation Test (Torture attempts).

system.effect: Once per game session, a user may re-roll a failed Medicae Test involving Surgery (Blood loss, saving/amputating limbs, attaching bionics, etc), or an Interrogation Test (Torture attempts).
